His research interests are in wireless networking, embedded sensing, and applied signal processing. Along with his students, he received a few research awards, including the ACM Sigmobile Rockstar Award, the UIUC Distinguished Alumni Award, the 2017 MobiSys Best Paper Award, etc. He was elevated to IEEE Fellow in 2018. Visit Romit's Systems Networking Research Group (SyNRG) at http://synrg.csl.illinois.edu [Hide]
